summary: Gym Member Portal: A web application where trainers can create and update workout plans, clients can track their progress in real-time, and includes an AI assistant named VORTEX. The app creator has full admin control over branding (logo, colors), user management, and app publication settings.
architectural_notes: Real-time data synchronization required for workout progress tracking
Centralized admin control over all app settings and user permissions
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Athletic fitness-themed logo icon suitable for a gym member portal (gym-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Hero banner image with energetic fitness theme for landing page (hero-fitness.dim_1200x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a trainer dashboard UI where trainers can view their assigned clients, create new workout plans, edit existing plans, and see client progress summaries.
Create a client dashboard UI where clients can view their assigned workout plans, log workout completions with actual metrics, and see their progress history with charts.

Create an admin control panel UI where the app creator can upload and change the logo, customize color scheme (primary, secondary, accent colors), manage all users (add/edit/remove trainers and clients), and assign clients to trainers.
Create a VORTEX AI assistant chat interface accessible to all users with a conversation view, message input, and contextual responses based on user role and workout data.
Apply the customizable branding (logo and colors) throughout the entire application UI so all users see the admin-configured theme.
Implement role-based access control so admins can access all features, trainers can only manage their assigned clients' workouts, and clients can only view and update their own progress.

Design a professional fitness-focused visual theme with energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple unless customized), modern typography, and clean layouts that work well for gym and fitness contexts. The theme should feel motivating and athletic while maintaining clarity and usability across trainer, client, and admin interfaces.

new_feature_requests.summary: Trainer dashboard to create and update workout plans
Client dashboard to view and track workout progress in real-time
Admin control panel for logo and color customization
User management system (add/remove trainers and clients)

Create a backend data model for workout plans that includes exercise name, sets, reps, weight, rest time, and notes. Workout plans must be associated with specific clients and created by specific trainers.
Implement backend functions for trainers to create, update, and delete workout plans for their assigned clients.
Create a backend data model for client progress tracking that records completed workouts, weight lifted, sets completed, date, and personal notes.
Implement backend functions for clients to log workout completions and update their progress metrics.
Create a user management system with three roles: admin, trainer, and client. Store user profiles with role, name, email, and assigned relationships (trainers to clients).
Implement backend functions for admin to add, edit, and remove users (trainers and clients), and to assign clients to trainers.
Create a backend storage system for app branding settings including logo URL, primary color, secondary color, and accent color. Include functions for admin to update these settings.
Implement an AI assistant named VORTEX with backend functions to handle user queries about workouts, exercises, fitness advice, and progress insights.
